# kCLErrorUserInfoAlternateRegionKey

**Global Variable**

A key in the user information dictionary of an error relating to a delayed region-monitoring response.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCLErrorUserInfoAlternateRegionKey: String
```

## Discussion

This key is included in an error of type [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLError-swift.struct/regionMonitoringResponseDelayed]. The value is a [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLRegion] object containing the region that location services can monitor more effectively.

## Errors

- **CLError**: A Core Location error.
- **kCLErrorDomain**: The domain for Core Location errors.

items.description: The domain for Core Location errors.
